data.name: Die drei ??? - Rätsel aus der Geisterwelt
data.detailed_description:
• – German language only –

An auction is held on the scrap yard in order to sell the estates of wealthy Nolan Gallagher: a mysterious helmet. What is the secret behind the strange auction? Will the bizarre headgear eventually lead its owner to some valuable estates?

The three investigators receive some mysterious messages from late Mr Gallagher, putting them on the scent very soon. But there are still some more ‘treasure-seekers‘ who want to find out about the millionaire’s mystery…

Help Jupiter, Peter, and Bob solve this ‘eerie’ case!

  • A new case for The Three Investigators
  • Detective adventure including many locations and characters from Rocky Beach
  • With the voices of Oliver Rohrbeck, Jens Wawrczeck, Andreas Fröhlich, and some more narrators known from The three Investigators audio plays
  • For players aged 10+
